---

# Existing future-dated amendment type

This document outlines the types of amendments that can be made to a subscription with an existing future-dated amendment, detailing supported and unsupported amendment types.

The following table shows the type of amendments that can be created (Supported Amendment Type) when a certain type of future-dated amendment already exists on the subscription (Existing Future-dated Amendment Type). This table describes the supported amendments and their future-dated amendments on the same product and on the same subscription.

|  | Existing Future-dated Amendment Type |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Supported Amendment Type | Add Product | Remove Product | Update Product | Terms and Conditions | Renewal | Owner Transfer | Cancel | Suspend | Resume |
| Add Product | N/A | N/A | N/A |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Remove Product | N/A |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Update Product | N/A | Details | Details |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Terms and Conditions |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Renewal | N/A | N/A | N/A | N/A | N/A | N/A | N/A |  |  |
| Owner Transfer |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Cancel |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Suspend | Details | Details |  |  |  |  |  |  |  |
| Resume | Details | Details |  |  |  |  |  |  | N/A |

Legend:

-   ![checkmarkGreen_xsm](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/7b53c77f-b021-4c49-aa2d-3152e36fce17?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..6hUAxHcsZ-0Tnx2uROgzyx1R3y_XBTGfDgrOxgnHIXw)(check mark): Zuora supports this amendment.

-   ![xmark](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/b1a4bbd0-819d-4906-81af-ae1bb7505b91?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..4esGkq2xCMbjoexuaDXPcRk_AjZM9jHv20auE3NCMT4) (cross mark): Zuora does not support this amendment.

-   N/A: This amendment is not applicable.


Notes:

-   The above table also applies to order actions .
